headline: Q1 Earnings Highs And Lows: Playa Hotels & Resorts (NASDAQ:PLYA) Vs The Rest Of The Travel and Vacation Providers Stocks
summary: The end of an earnings season can be a great time to discover new stocks and assess how companies are handling the current business environment. Let’s take a look at how Playa Hotels & Resorts (NASDAQ:PLYA) and the rest of the travel and vacation providers stocks fared in Q1.
